## ./pachctl update-dash

Update and redeploy the Pachyderm Dashboard at the latest compatible version.

### Synopsis


Update and redeploy the Pachyderm Dashboard at the latest compatible version.

```
./pachctl update-dash
```

### Options

```
      --dry-run   Don't actually deploy Pachyderm Dash to Kubernetes, instead just print the manifest.
```
